overview: Marissa (Anjani Dina) life is perfect. Besides having Papa (Ferry Salim) and Mama (Karina Kelvin) who dote on, during the past two years Marissa is dating Michael (Brandon Salim), best-looking guy in school. Suddenly all change when Michael breakes their relationship and dates Selina (Indah Permatasari).
title: 7 Hari Menembus Waktu
